All,

Just in case anyone might be interested, I have a paper on some of my
work for a hardware accelerator for NEAT. It's available at the
following url:

http://www.eeng.dcu.ie/~larkind/ICONIP06_larkind.pdf

This paper describes the preliminary hardware architecture from about
six months ago.

If anyone has any comments I'd be delighted to hear them

Regards,
Daniel
